Huyen Chau Nguyen 
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
nguyenchauhuyen@gmail.com / 0907905956 
Consultant’s candidate reviews: 
- 
Graduated from University of Natural Sciences 
- 
About 4 years experience with ReactJS, Redux. 
- 
Senior Front-end at DXC Technology - a big product company, where he 
improved his English skills and experience from big projects. 
- 
Fluent in English communication skills. 
- 
Nice, friendly, hard and willing to learn 
- 
He is good at solving technical problems and has good attitude 
- 
Salary expectation: above $2500 net

11 years of experience in software design, developing and programming for multiple 
platforms. Has strong knowledge and experience on Web Front-End and Mobile. Has 
strong knowledge of Object-Oriented Analysis, Design and Programming, Design 
Patterns and Software Frameworks, Unit Test. Able to learn new technologies quickly 
through self-study/research. 
Currently I am working for FayFay.com, an online travel booking platform. The current 
project, I play the role as a frontend expert, responsible for the UI/UX of the web sites,

Title: Senior Frontend Engineer 
Technical Environment: React/Redux, SailsJS, SASS, HTML5, CSS3 
Roles performed: 
• 
Work on backend / frontend and Middleware layer to develop AXA internal and external web 
sites and solutions, consistent with Customer’s quality and branding guidelines. 
• 
Implement new sections/features/content for new and existing web sites. 
• 
Develop and optimize existing features, as well as prototype and implement new features. 
• 
Adhere to AXA Group web standards, usability and best practices defined and maintained by 
Digital Team of AXA. 
• 
Interpret existing site design and style guides by creating pixel perfect web pages from 
Photoshop files. 
• 
Attend daily stand-up meetings, estimate the effort to implement user stories and develop to 
achieve sprint goals.
